Package nslj.src.display.j3d

Interface Summary
KeyListener KeyListener interface - models that want to handle key events themselves should implement this
 

Class Summary
Body Abstract body class - basically manages a hierarchy of body segments and provides methods for inverse and forward kinematics and localization of end-effector
BodyController Motor controller for a whole body
BodySegment A limb of the body including the joint connecting it to its parent limb and a set of controllers - one for each degree of freedom (DOF)
BodySegmentAxisController Controller for a single body segment axis
Box Represents a generic box
Capsule Represents a generic capsule
Cone  
Cylinder Represents a generic cylinder
Hammer  
IKController Inverse kinematics controller for body
KeyBehavior Behavior for navigating 3d worlds with the keypad
KeyCustomBehavior Key behavior that passes move and rotate events back to a KeyListener rather than handling them itself
Matrix This class implements some matrix operations that I need for other things I'm doing.
NslObject3d NslObject3d - A simulated 3D object that includes visualization (Java3d) and physical simulation (ODE) components
NslVecmathUtils Utilities for vector math
OffScreenCanvas3D A Canvas3D for offscreen printing
PDController Proportional Derivative (PD) controller for controller body joints
PIDController Proportional Integrate Derivative (PID) controller for controller body joints
Plane Represents a generic plane
PrimateBody A primate arm and hand
Sphere Represents a generic sphere
VisualTarget Represents a visual target with no physical component
